Rhode Island Masters' Cycling Classic and the Hodges Village Damn Mountain Bike Race i

2014-06-24 19:03:02 -0400

The Blue Hills squad is rolling into Summer strong! Ari Shocket started it off with a Win at the Rhode Island Masters' Cycling Classic in the 40+ Category. Philip Golden Followed it up with a Second Place CAT2 Finish at the Hodges Village Damn Mountain Bike Race in Oxford, MA. The Blue Hills Dirt Squad Represented in all 3 Categories this week.

Rhode Island Masters' Cycling Classic (Jun 21 2014)
Ari Shocket CAT 1-4 40-44 40k 1/5
Ari Shocket CAT 1-4 40-44 20K 3/6
William Paredes CAT 5 45-49 20K 4/4
Bob Sherner CAT 1-5 65-69 8/9

 

The Keith Berger Memorial Criterium (Jun 22 2014)
Austin Guyette CAT 3/4 60/66
Austin/ Guyette CAT 4/5 7/62

 

Hodges Village Damn Mountain Bike Race (June 22, 2014)
Pete Werner CAT 1 30-39 7/10
Philip Golden CAT 2 40-49 2/15
Jeff Muldoon CAT 2 30-39 9/10

Adam's Farm Short Track #2

2014-06-20 18:23:42 -0400

We kicked the second Adam's Farm Short Track Training race this past Wednesday and had another awesome turnout! Pete MacLeod changed the course up a bit for this race. The laps were shorter but a little bit harder.

A RacePoints B RacePoints
1 PJ Renquin60 Sean Pantellere60
2Will Crissman55 Patrick Collins55
3Jeff Fairbanks50 Greg Colby50
4Charlie Schubert45  Ryan Aittaniemi45

Purgatory Road Race & Massachusetts State Championships

2014-06-09 14:28:08 -0400

Adam Shutes with an impressive second place finish at the Purgatory Road Race & Massachusetts State Championships
